bill_title: require legislative approval for the acquisition, construction, or expansion of certain campgrounds.

bill_versions.bill_text: An Act to require legislative approval for the acquisition, construction, or expansion of certain campgrounds. Be it enacted by the Legislature of the State of South Dakota: Section 1. That § 41-17-4 be AMENDED: 41-17-4. The Department of Game, Fish and Parks may, with the approval of the Governor and commissioner of administration, purchase, construct, or otherwise acquire, or contract for the feasibility survey, construction, completion, equipping, or furnishing of any recreational or parks facility within any state park or state recreation area if the Game, Fish and Parks Commission deems the facility to be necessary and feasible. Nothing in this section authorizes the department to contract for or expend moneys for the acquisition or construction of any new campground or the expansion of any existing campground, without the express approval of the Legislature. For purposes of this section, the term, campground, includes camping sites for recreational vehicles or tents, and camping cabins.

action_log.status_text: First read in Senate and referred to
